author: briseno1984

comments.content: [Bombshell Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406063117/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/). This font has a huge set of [OT alternate glyphs](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406063117/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/regular/glyphs.html). I didn't see the leading 's' - but I'm sure it's in there somewhere ...
